org.apache.spark.streaming.kafka

Interface HasOffsetRanges

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    KafkaRDD

    public interface HasOffsetRanges
    :: Experimental :: Represents any object that has a collection of OffsetRanges. This can be used access the offset ranges in RDDs generated by the direct Kafka DStream (see KafkaUtils.createDirectStream()). 
    
   KafkaUtils.createDirectStream(...).foreachRDD { rdd =>
      val offsetRanges = rdd.asInstanceOf[HasOffsetRanges].offsetRanges
      ...
   }
